items.sentence: Is Tom the only one here who knows how to do this?
We could see smoke from campfires along the shore.
I am once again asking for your financial support.
Someone broke into our house while we were asleep.
Tom slept in the cave, and Mary slept in the tent.
Tom was asleep in front of the TV when I got home.
What surprised me the most was how long Tom slept.
My kitchen help has the intelligence of a spatula.
Is it true that you'll be in Boston all next week?
Tom was about to leave when Mary entered the room.
